trends: There have been 7 other sightings in prospect
There were no other sightings in prospect on or around August 6th 2007
Summary: object flew towards us, hovered, flashed two lights as if looking at us, flew away very quickly
divs: Sighting Detailsmy husb and i were star-gazing around time of perseids, a few days before the peak night, and were sitting on a power dam on the rogue river. it was between 2 and 3 am. we were struck by some pulsing lights in the sky as we walked from our rv to the river. those lights were unexplainable: we were approximately 45 miles from nearest city (medford, or.) as we sat at the dam and talked about stars and the weird lights we noticed two lights coming towards us from down river, from the southwest, which was also seemingly the area of the pulsing lights, which were no longer occuring. it took approximately 3-5 minutes and to me appeared to be coming directly at us, as if looking for us. i should have mentioned that there were wispy, thin, clouds over the entire sky, although the stars were still slightly visible. the object flew towards us slowly and then stopped directly overhead, and the two lights brightened distinctly as if looking directly at us. they remained brightened for about 10-15 seconds, and then dimmed to original strength. i then saw what appeared to be another object, exactly like the first, continue on original path, northeast, and sumultaneously, the first one did a quick, very quick, zig zag like move toward the east and disappeared. my husband did not see second object, but agreed that first object moved too quickly and with agility we had never seen, or heard of, in human vehicles.
